title: Convincing
review:
Maybe the movie could be a little shorter. I still had a good time.
The characters are very motivated. Convincing.

title: historical fantasy
review: The movie has a strange story, vampires have been added to historical characters and events. America fought vampires in the civil war. I did not like the movie. Those who love action cinema may like it.

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
title: an immortal story
review: I watched the first movie and then read the book. I had read all the books before the other two sections were published. Books are written in visual language. I can say the book is like a script already. The visual effects of the movie were legendary for that time. Now it sounds ordinary and even bad. Although the visual effects have aged for years, the story is still up to date and look like new.

movie_title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
title: this movie impressed me
review: What is the atmosphere in cinema? People who want to learn can watch this movie. Every American based on a true event has a story that he knows. But it's not the story that matters. 'Atmosphere'

title: Great
review: I'm prejudiced against Korean movies. It sounds like simple imitations of Hollywood movies. But this movie is really different. Congratulations they made a very good movie. He definitely deserved Oscar.

title: Legendary characters, legendary actors.
review: Usually the second film in the series is worse than the first. Sometimes the second movie gets better. There is another situation here. When the filmmakers did not hold the first film, the entire film's team was changed for second film. Thus, one of the most important films in the history of cinema emerged.

title: not like greek mythology
review: I like Robert Zemeckis. But he was obsessed with this animation business. There is nothing interesting in this movie. Since it was a mythological story, my expectations from this movie were high. But no excitement, no curiosity.
